edu.columbia.cs.sdarts.backend.doc
Class DocMetaAttributesBuilder

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--edu.columbia.cs.sdarts.common.LSPMetaAttributesBuilder
        |
        +--edu.columbia.cs.sdarts.backend.doc.DocMetaAttributesBuilder
public class DocMetaAttributesBuilder
extends LSPMetaAttributesBuilder

Saves and loads an LSPMetaAttributes as a flat STARTS XML file. It builds on its superclass, which already knows how to turn the STARTS XML file into a LSPMetaAttributes. In this package, the notion is that since the document collection is stored as text, so should its meta-attributes.

The filename under which the content summary is persisted is always the same: it is a constant inside DocConstants.

The directory is the same place where the BackEndLSP that owns the LSPMetaAttributes keeps its doc_config.xml file: SDARTS_HOME/config/backEndLSPName
